summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the traffic code, amending Sections 11.14.670, 11.20.347, 11.23.400, 11.27.020, 11.34.020, 11.52.100, 11.53.440, 11.55.060, 11.55.100, 11.55.120, 11.58.195 and 11.72.065 and adding sections to Chapters 11.14. 11.22, 11.31, 11.52 and 11.56 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
